name: NationalParksTheme
0:
”Alexa, start National Parks Theme”
”Alexa, launch National Parks Theme”
”Alexa, enable National Parks Theme”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: national parks theme
des:
Answer the call of the wild and enable Alexa’s National Parks theme. Enjoy majestic images and sounds from various national parks added to your daily experiences. Alexa brings the great outdoors to your device when you ask for for things like the weather, alarms, and even jokes. 

To get started, just say, “Alexa, start National Parks theme.” 

The National Parks Theme theme doesn’t transform every aspect of your Alexa experience. 

To deactivate the theme, just say, “Alexa, turn off National Parks Theme.” 


THINGS TO TRY:
“Alexa, what's the weather?”
“Alexa, set a 9:00 AM alarm.”
“Alexa, set a 10 minute timer.”
“Alexa, hello.”
“Alexa, how are you?”
“Alexa, thank you.”
“Alexa, tell me a nature joke.”

THINGS WE WANT YOU TO KNOW:
The National Parks theme isn’t available on Kids Edition Echo devices or Echo devices that are set in Kids Mode.
